direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods access the ParameterType instance and retrieve related information.
Both methods retrieve specific attributes from the ParameterType instance.
Both methods access and return attributes related to the ParameterType instance.

enhanced_by.reason: The build method initializes the Argument instances which are necessary for getType to function.
The parse method initializes Group instances which are used in the build method.
The getValue method is often called before getType to ensure the value is available.
